column4: im looking at my harddrive space... it says 284 gigs total... 280 gigs free... but only 266 gigs available... what gives ?
where is my invisible harddrive space ?
im looking at my harddrive space... it says 284 gigs total... 280 gigs free... but only 266 gigs available... what gives ?
some of it may be swap or it could be a counting error
